copy.video-1-title: A revolutionary mark on a revolutionary new line
copy.video-1-desc: Behold the KitchenAid® Medallion, the iconic finishing stamp on all of our revolutionary new refrigerators, wall-ovens, dishwashers, microwaves and ranges. It’s a mark that lets you know you’re cooking with a suite of chef-inspired, premium appliances.
